ygData.messageBody:
How on earth did they let a bard have a runed bolster belt? =)
Seriously, being the weakest of the melee classes what sort of dragon
loot system is used that allowed you to be have such an item. Also does
it make you ineligible for Selo's drum and Horn of War?
A few improvements in your equipment I might add if you dont mind which
you're probably already aware of.
Wear Imbrued gloves (assuming you have them), the lambent ones are just
awful looking. If you're ever able to get a Tranix crown, wear that over
Imbrued (assuming you dont have one). Imbrued helm also looks awful =).
Crested spaulders -better ac and hp, dex useless since your weapons dont
proc. Hooded black cloak if you're lucky enough to obtain one - the 45
hp outweighs the extra 2 ac on cloak of shadows in my opinion.
Diamondine earrings - 122 charisma is plenty so you can afford to lose
the opallines, especially if you choose Tranix over Imbrued.
I'm still trying to figure out why your dex is so high. Imbrued BP (13),
bracer (3), Gloves (5), Belt (10), Pauldrons (7 or 9?), Cloak (5). Also
how much hp does the bolster belt give you? I'm assuming roughly 30 hp.
Please let me know.

Maev Lorekeeper
Tarew Marr
